diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,32 @@
+class RemovePolymorphismFromRatings < ActiveRecord::Migration[5.1]
+  class Rating < ActiveRecord::Base; end
body:
Hm, good point! This is actually a scenario I never thought of before - but sounds plausible 🤔 

The reason why I thought this wouldn't be a problem: the migration-class is not an `ActiveRecord::Base` class and therefore does _(at least that's how I understand it)_ not add a prefix to its nested classes...

But what you say sounds plausible - I'll add it just to play save ✌️
